Description: COME TOGETHER. LIVE BETTER. Welcome to Union on Queen, a modern community where you can connect & thrive. With expansive living areas, this naturally welcoming space has it all: a genius bar, e-lounge, private conference rooms, a stylish club room & open kitchen ? perfect for everyday lounging, socializing, or occasional hosting. Work out in the fully-wired fitness center or visit the cozy rooftop for Monument views. Union on Queen gives you an all access pass to the best DC & VA have to offer. Arlington and Rosslyn offer retail essentials, while Courthouse hosts unique diversions and restaurants. Need a lift? The Orange, Blue and Silver Metro lines will get you connected in minutes. Ready to hit the open road? Routes 50, I-66 and the George Washington Parkway are yours for the taking. Best of all, a 20 minute walk over the Key Bridge puts you right in historic Georgetown.

Your friends will be green with envy.

Description: Ask about our Newly Renovated Apartment Homes! Welcome to Shirlington House, traditional high rise apartments, located in the urban The Village of Shirlington in Arlington, VA. An area that was developed in the 1940's as one of the first shopping centers in the country, you will appreciate the pedestrian-friendly village with walkability to the Washington-Old Dominion bike trail and Four Mile run trail, as well as Fort Reynolds park. Spend an afternoon exploring the locally owned shops and restaurants home to some of the District's best eats. Or indulge your need for culture at the nationally recognized Signature Theatre or read a book at The Village Library. Shirlington's Transit Station is minutes from your front door to easily get you to the Pentagon Metro, I-395 takes you straight into DC or drive into Old Town Alexandria in just minutes. Shirlington House offers classic and newly renovated studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes. Our many amenities include a 24-Hour Concierge with Package Receiving, large pet park with agility course, refreshing swimming pool with sun deck and new seating, an on-site convenience store, reserved and covered parking, and 24-Hour fitness center. From your home enjoy views of Washington, DC and the Northern Virginia suburbs in spacious floorplans with large expansive windows, soaring 9 ft ceilings* and a white appliance package. A select few of our homes offer walk in closets. Discover Apartment Living At Its Best and reserve your home today!

Description: The Citizen at Shirlington Village is the perfect place to live. A self-contained town center, it boasts a walkable mix of restaurants, shops and entertainment options, with The Citizen at Shirlington Village at its center. With easy access to I-395 and Highway 7, The Citizen at Shirlington Village is ideally situated for commuters. Our charming community is just minutes away from the Pentagon as well as all of the shopping, delectable dining, and unmatched entertainment that the nearby Washington, D.C. metro area has to offer. * The Citizen at Shirlington Village offers its residents unique one, two, or three bedroom apartment homes, in addition to community amenities such as our outdoor BBQ and dining area, fitness center and racquetball court. * Take a swim in our picturesque pool, stroll through our pet-friendly community, or have a day out on the town in nearby Washington, D.C. You deserve the very best in apartment living and our community offers the chance to lead the life youve always wanted. * We invite you to browse our photo gallery and schedule your appointment or drop by and visit us today for your personal tour!

Also enjoy our 24-hour fitness center with yoga studio and our indoor basketball and racquetball court.

Description: Welcome to Dominion Plaza, traditional high rise apartments overlooking the Army/Navy Country Club with capitvating views of the DC Skyline in Arlington, VA. Conveniently located just a block from Columbia Pike for easy access to grocery stores, shops, and restaurants. Our location is ideal to grab a bike from Capital Bikeshare to explore nearby parks, farmer's markets, and bike trails. Frequent buses to the Pentagon Metro are easily accessible, and I-395 takes you straight into DC or Arlington in minutes. Dominion Plaza offers studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes. Enjoy metropolitan life with views of DC and Virginia from our rooftop terrace, relax in our swimming pool and stay healthy in our fitness center. Indulge in your favorite meals with our open kitchens. Feel accomplished in our 24-hour business center with free Wi-Fi. Entertain friends and family in our grilling and playground area. Discover Apartment Living At Its Best and reserve your home today!

Description: Welcome to Potomac Towers, traditional high rise apartments, located in the in the heart of Arlington, VA. Potomac Towers. Nestled near Rosslyn and Courthouse Potomac Towers is an ideal location, just minutes from Georgetown via the Key Bridge, I-66, Route 50 and Lee Highway. Getting around the city is easy with the Courthouse Metro, which is about a ten minute walk,or grab a bike share and take a ride to nearby shops and restaurants. Potomac Towers offers studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes. Enjoy metropolitan life with amazing views of DC, Maryland, and Virginia from our rooftop deck, relax in our swimming pool and stay healthy in our fitness center. We even have a convenience store and dry cleaning located in the building. Our remodeled homes blend bright windows with charming hardwood floors to provide that cozy feel at the end of a long day. Entertain friends and family, in our grilling and playground area. Discover Apartment Living At Its Best and reserve your home today!

Description: The Crestmont offers residents a highly walkable, transit-oriented location in the center of Arlington, only one stop on the Metro from Washington, DC. The property is a short walk from the Rosslyn Metro Station and the Key Bridge and is also close to I-66 and the George Washington Parkway, providing vital commuting alternatives to employment centers throughout the Washington, DC area. The Crestmont is near a variety of major employers and upscale shopping centers, as well as lively, historic Georgetown. Residents can choose from a range of attractive one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment layouts with hardwood floors, central air conditioning and a host of other amenities, including reserved parking. So come to The Crestmont and start enjoying a sophisticated urban lifestyle in the heart of the nations capital.

Dogs Allowed:
All residents with pets are required to submit a veterinarian statement establishing the general health, breed or breed mix of the pet and the proof of current rabies shots and licenses required by law. Support Animals: If the animal is a service animal for a disabled person, you are not required to post an animal deposit, and breed restrictions do not apply. A completed and signed Letter Regarding Support Animals from a qualified * professional verifying the need for the service animal along with proof of current rabies shots and licenses (if legally * applicable) is required. Description: Youll love the convenience of strolling to locally owned shops, services, restaurants, and the parks of our Columbia Pike neighborhood. With so much near by, the location cant be beat. The offices, shopping, and dining of Pentagon City, the Pentagon, Rosslyn, Clarendon, Courthouse, and Ballston are just a short drive away. Youll be right on the bus route, and have easy access to I-395, Washington Reagan National Airport, and even Old Town Alexandria.Choose from our many spacious and open floorplans to call home, from junior one-bedrooms to two-bedrooms with dens. We havent forgotten to include lots of closets for storage and even wall-to-wall carpeting throughout. You won't find large rooms like these in the newer, more expensive, buildings in the area. Cable TV and Internet access are available.Relax on your balcony (accessorized with vertical blinds) or seek the sun at our beautiful rooftop swimming pools and sundecks. State-of-the-art fitness centers will keep you in shape 24 hours a day; and our 24-hour front-desk with business service center is here to serve you. Outside, youll find open green spaces, with landscaped yards and gardens, trees and flowers. We also offer drycleaning drop off service.

Description: Your sanctuary in the city! Located in the heart of Arlington, VA, we are just one Metro stop from D.C. and minutes to Rt. 66, the Beltway, Reagan National Airport, and historic Georgetown. Great dining and entertainment are just outside your doorstep. Oakwood Arlington offers one and two-bedroom apartments that include linens, dishes, phone, utilities, cable with HBO, washer/dryer, balcony, TV and weekly housekeeping. Enjoy upgraded bed linens and elegant photography by company chairman Howard Ruby with the new Oakwood Signature Package. You'll also have access to our swimming pool and 24-hour fitness center. Resident activities include movie nights, Saturday morning complimentary continental breakfast and more! Dogs and cats are welcome. Our courtesy staff is available 24/7 to ensure superior service. At Oakwood Arlington we know how comfortable home is and we make sure you feel like you never left.

Description: Penthouse apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms overlooking DC Monuments. Our unit is over 1500 square feet and will sleep up to 6. Living Room view looks directly out to the Washington Monument and Potomac River. The unit is 2 blocks to the Rosslyn Metro (5 stops to National Airport, 1 stop to downtown) and a short walk to Georgetown and downtown DC. It has a wrap around patio with views of the Washington Monument, Capitol, Lincoln Memorial, Jefferson Memorial and Potomac River. Inside there are 2 large bedrooms with Queen Size beds, 2 bathrooms, a wood burning fireplace, large Plasma TV and high speed Internet service, linens, table settings, full kitchen included. Flexible lease terms. Perfect location for watching the 4th of July fireworks. Available immediately.

Description:
Beautiful 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath (675 sq/ft) Condo in Rosslyn
Incredible view overlooking Georgetown, Potomac River, Key Bridge, and National Cathedral
Available for move in late October for $1,895/month. Rent includes gas heat, trash and water. Small dogs ok.
Convenience:
-Walking distance to Georgetown
-Lots of shopping, entertainment, dining within 4 blocks
-Ample parking (parking lot is rarely more than half full)
-2 blocks to Rosslyn Metro (Orange & Blue lines)
-2 blocks to Key Bridge (Georgetown)
-2 blocks to Metrobus, Georgetown shuttle, Georgetown Univ bus, Arlington Transit, State Dept
bus, Pentagon shuttle
-Courthouse: 10 minutes
-Clarendon: 12 Minutes
-Ballston: 15 Minutes
-Reagan National Airport: 15 Minutes
-Downtown Washington DC:10 Minutes
-Less than  Mile to I-66, GW Parkway, and Lee Highway (easy access)
-Minutes from Reagan National Airport
-W&OD/Mt. Vernon Trail
Comfort:
-Updated kitchen including kitchen island with cabinets, granite counter tops and stainless steel gas range & dishwasher
-Plenty of closet space (walk-in closet and linen closet in BR, coat closet across from bathroom)
-Secure building, controlled access
-Quiet tree lined neighborhood
-Top floor unit (4 th floor, 1  flights of stairs)
-Covered balcony
-Recently painted
Other:
-Window A/C unit
-Laundry room in building
-Bike room storage
-Extra storage room on ground level
Please call Mike at 571-212-8208 if interested or have any questions about the property.

Description: Luxury 716sf 1BR unit for immediate occupancy. Totally updated, wood fl throughout. Granite/Cherry kitchen, tiled floor; spacious bright LR w large window facing west. Elfa closet system in south facing BR. New windows and blinds. Tastefully renovated bath w bronze fixtures, ceramic tile and tub. Pool/gym/onsite cleaner/convenient store/barber. 2 blocks to Rosslyn metro. ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED, except phone and internet.

Description:
Great price point, great location and GREAT studio apartment! You can't beat it! You won't find another unit at this price within a few blocks of the Clarendon Metro. This studio apartment features hardwood floors throughout, updated windows, central air and lots of closet space. This studio has a wall dividing the large kitchen from the living area giving you a more desirable layout than you will find in other studios. Tenants pay electric and gas. Landlord is responsible for water, sewer, trash. Sorry, no pets.
Grocery stores, coffee shops, restaurants, bars, shopping are all nearby - Clarendon at your doorstep! Building is near Henry Clay Park, Central Park and Lyon Park. There are excellent bike lanes and the terrain is flat as a pancake. Come see it!

Description:
Hi! Our awesome 3BR 1.5ba group house is losing two members, and I'm looking to fill their slots for a Dec 1st move-in. The house is in Lyon Park, one mile away from Clarendon Metro. One room is on the ground floor and has an attached half bath, the other is on the second level. Both will easily accommodate a Queen size bed, along with a desk, bookshelf, etc. The house will be mostly unfurnished since the departing guys are taking all their stuff. I'm in the process of acquiring replacements, but preference will be given to anyone who has a dining table, chairs, TV stand, etc. 
I'm a 30-something working professional who loves to cook, amateur wine geek, and I enjoy working out during the week, but on weekends I enjoy hanging out or going on day trip, kickball, and occasionally driving out to a Loudoun County brewery/winery. I enjoy being friendly with housemates, whether that be catching a happy hour, going to a show, or having a house dinner, but I also understand everyone needs time to themselves. 
Rent is $900/month (per room.) Utilities (heat/electricity/Cable/Wi-Fi) are about $150, depending on the season. Water is paid quarterly and is about $100/pp. Also, to prevent anyone from feeling like they are always the one replacing the TP, paper towels, dish soap, etc., we share those expenses. -	Washer/dryer in basement
-	Central Air/Heat
-	Real Fireplace!

Description:
Description:
2 Bedroom 2 bath 1400 Sq ft newly remodeled condo with amazing views overlooking DC. Brand new hardwood floors throughout, marble in entry way and in both bathrooms. Brand new stainless steel appliances including: dishwasher, microwave, smooth top electric range, side by side refrigerator, washer and dryer (Front loaders). Brand new lighting fixtures throughout the house. 1 parking spot included in rent. Community outdoor pool, dog walking park, full gym and sauna. Centrally located between 3 metro stops: * Crystal City Metro (2 blocks)
* Pentagon City Metro (2 blocks)
* Pentagon Metro, (2 blocks) Grocery store (Whole Foods coming), Costco and Mall all within walking distance. Rent includes all utilities (water, electric, gas), one assigned parking spot in the garage and bike storage. Available July 1st Condo Details:
Square Feet: 1400
Bedrooms: 2
Bath: 2
Appliances: Range/Oven/Dishwasher/Microwave/Refrigerator/Washer/Dryer
Pool (Outdoor)
ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED
Gym *Rental Agreement: $3,399/ Month with 12 month lease requirement.
*Security deposit : 1 Month's rent *Pet Agreement: Pets are allowed. Cats and small dogs.
*$300 move in fee required from the HOA
*Credit check required To schedule a viewing or ask a question reply to this post with your name, email and contact number.

Description: Immaculate condo in boutique Rosslyn building! Open floor plan includes gorgeous kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite counters and custom backsplash. Hardwood floors throughout incl. bedroom, large walk-in closet with custom Elfa shelving. High ceilings and lots of natural light! Walk to 2 Metro stops, restaurants, Target, Safeway. DC is 1 stop away on Orange, Silver and Blue Lines!

Description: Spacious Corner 2 Bdrm/2 Bath unit condominium with eastern exposure. Great natural lighting throughout the day with monument view. Luxurious building amenities including outdoor pool, fitness center, front desk concierge, and club room. 24 hour Harris Teeter located on site. Conveniently located next to the Glebe Road Metroway Bus stop. Parking spot included with rent.

Description:
This is one of several similar studios for rent in the same ultra-convenient setting, adjacent to Washington D.C. All of the units are high-end, in a leafy, resort-style complex, two blocks from the Rosslyn metro stop. It's an ideal spot for touring D.C. -- only minutes' walk to metro, bus, bicycle-sharing stations and Zipcars. An uncommon collection of major attractions is within easy walking distance.
From the apartment, you may walk across the picturesque Key Bridge to D.C.'s trendy Georgetown neighborhood of ethnic restaurants, lively bars, movies and busy nightlife. Also in easy walking distance is Theodore Roosevelt Island, an 88.5-acre nature preserve in the Potomac crisscrossed by nature trails and boardwalk that zips you from the urban environment.
The building, known as River Place South, is part of a gated community. A concierge is on duty in the upscale lobby. Community amenities include a resort-style outdoor pool with lap lanes and Jacuzzi-like hot whirlpool (open from Memorial Day to Labor Day). In addition to the in-house health club with late-model cardio and strength equipment and stretching area. there's an on-site grocery store open until at least 11 pm 7 days a week; hair salon; and on-site dry cleaner. On-site parking may be available by special arrangement @ $125 per month.
Early check-in also may be available. If so, we're happy to accommodate.
Washer/dryers are on the building's first floor, operated with a credit card, debit card or quarters.
Substantial improvements have been made to the building in the past couple years, including all new windows; four new elevators, a resurfaced roof and laundry room makeover, including advanced washing machines and dryers, capable of texting when a load is completed.

Description:
This ultra-convenient studio overlooks the Potomac River and Washington D.C.'s magnificent, milky-white monuments. The studio's panoramic view includes the Lincoln and Jefferson memorials, Washington Monument, Capitol dome and the Kennedy Center, as pictured.
It's one of several high-end studios -- fully furnished and equipped -- for rent at River Place, a popular resort-style complex . River Place lies only minutes from Washington DC and but a five-minute walk to the Rosslyn metro station. An uncommon collection of major attractions is within easy walking distance.
This newly renovated studio, which is on the 4th floor, features a full-sized bed and a convertible sofa/sleeper. Included are kitchen cabinets with accent lights; granite kitchen countertop; new bamboo hardwood floor; new, high-performance picture window and blinds; fresh paint throughout.
The River Place South building is the jewel of the leafy, gated community. The ultra-convenient location provides easy access to such major thoroughfares as the George Washington Memorial Parkway, Route 29 and Interstate 66, the only Interstate highway running west from Washington D.C. into northern Virginia.
High-speed Wi-Fi access and a large cable TV selection are provided via Verizon FiOS. The popular River Place South building also houses a cutting-edge fitness center with late-model cardio and strength equipment. The gym re-opened in March 2014 after more than $250,000 in renovations and the purchase of new equipment.
The apartment itself is sunny with a wall-to-wall picture window framing the stunning view; walk-in closet and built-in bookcases. It's fully equipped with kitchenware and linens. This unit is 401 square feet and includes an efficient galley kitchen with full-size refrigerator, garbage disposal and microwave oven.
From the apartment, you may walk across the picturesque Key Bridge in about 15 minutes to D.C.'s trendy Georgetown neighborhood of ethnic restaurants, lively clubs and busy nightlife. Everything is at your fingertips here -- it's perfect for touring Washington D.C. and surrounding areas. Also within walking distance is Theodore Roosevelt Island, an 88.5-acre nature preserve in the Potomac crisscrossed by nature trails and boardwalk that transports you from the urban environment. Zipcar and Capital Bikeshare stations are within a few minutes' walk.
A concierge is on duty in the River Place South building's newly renovated, upscale lobby. Community amenities include a resort-style outdoor pool with lap lanes and Jacuzzi-like hot whirlpool. Also featured: the in-house health club, including sauna and steam room; an on-site grocery store (open until at least 11 p.m. 7 days a week), hair salon and a dry cleaner. On-site parking may be available by special arrangement @ $125 per month. New "smart" washer/dryers are on the building's first floor, operated with a credit card or quarters and capable of sending an SMS text message when they have finished a load.

Description:
Sunny, Top Floor, Hardwood Floors, Fairlington Villages 1BR Apartment/Condo with Balcony
This well appointed and sunny home is flooded with light from both sides. Enjoy streams of morning sunshine through two large windows in the living room which afford treetop views of the stately oak tree out front. Afternoon light streams into the kitchen and through french doors which open to a spacious balcony with top floor sunset views. 
This lovingly-maintained one bedroom condo in historic Fairlington Villages in Arlington, Virginia boasts a surprising amount of storage with a walk-in entry closet, linen closet that also houses full size washer/dryer, a walk in closet in the bedroom, and yet another bonus closet in the bedroom. 
Hardwood floors provide a clean, allergen-friendly, and elegant canvas for your decorating. The kitchen has gleaming stainless steel appliances and loads of cabinet storage. 
Rent includes free access to the community swimming pools and tennis courts. 
A beautifully maintained and landscaped community with mature trees, Fairlington Villages is a collection of condos and townhouses with many long time residents. It has an old town village charm and a real sense of community fueled by activities like the the mimosa tennis open, book clubs, singles events, July 4th holiday parade, Spring yard sale, and end of season doggy dip in the pool! 
A quiet location, no windows open to a road -- the unit backs to a courtyard and the front to the private parking lot with ample parking. (Rent includes a pass for the lot.)
Within walking distance to Shirlington with restaurants, movie theaters, Signature live theater, Harris Teeter grocery store, Arlington County library, coffee shop and more. Near public transportation, and easy access to 395. 
No pets and no smoking. Viewings by appointment.

Description: ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED and MOVE IN DATE NEGOTIABLE! Rare, move-in ready 1 bed and 1 full bath condo in quiet, pet-friendly neighborhood in Arlington. Updated bathroom; Beautiful kitchen with new dishwasher, new back splash, fan, hood vent, and appliances; Huge master bedroom, 2 walk-in closets, Big open living and dinner room space; and Small pets allowed. Additional photos available upon request. Rent includes ALL utilities except internet and cable. Keyed laundry facility, Keyed separate storage facility. Includes 1 parking spot and visitor pass. Ideal location, walking distance to Shirlington with bars, restaurants and theaters, less than 5 minutes from the Pentagon and Fort Myer, Minutes from D.C. Nationals Park, Ballston and Clarendon. Close to several other military bases and offices. No smoking allowed in the unit. Plenty of beautiful green space with grills and a pool are available for use. Great paths, huge dog park, and community gardens right outside. First months rent and security deposit are due upon move-in. Pets are welcome, but an additional deposit is required. Please contact with any questions.

Description:
Great community, next to the biking trails, 10 min from downtown.  
West Village of Shirlington Community.
$1,850 rent covers condo fees, water, and gas.
Available November 1.
-850 sq. ft. plus a large balcony
-Walk in closet
-Huge balcony
-Stainless steel appliances
-New washer and dryer within the unit
-Gourmet kitchen with granite countertops
-Beautiful wood floors throughout
-Wired for cable, home networks, and Verizon FIOS
-Short walking distance to downtown Shirlington (restaurants and retail)
-Direct Metro Shuttle
-Direct access to the W&OD Bike/Run Trail
-Minutes from I-395 and Washington DC
-Community Amenities include:
------ New and Large Outdoor Pool
------ State of the Art Gym
------ Newly renovated huge Party Room (w/ pool table, poker tables, big screen TV)
------ Business Center with free wireless internet access
------ Outdoor Grills
-Tenant Parking lot right outside unit
Security deposit required
Pets on case by case basis
Please email with questions and to schedule a viewing.

Description: Renovated kitchen and bath, walk in closet, an ideal place for commuters. Walk to Rosslyn metro within few minutes, Easy access to Georgetown, downtown, Pentagon and Crystal City. Gated community, central AC, Front desk service, 24 hr security, outdoor pool, health club, party room, game/picnic area. Water/gas/electricity included. Garage parking is available at an additional fee.

Description:
1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom Lease Takeover (not a sublease). Washer and dryer in unit. Happy to give anyone interested a tour of my place.
I am moving out of my apartment, and I need someone to take over the lease starting November 13 (date is flexible). Rent is $1,620 (additional $50 for unreserved garage parking if needed). Street parking is pretty easy to find, though, so up to you.
My apartment is very spacious, quiet, and the community is awesome (very dog friendly). It's about a 10-15 minute walk to the Ballston metro, so you're still within walking distance of everything Ballston has to offer, but also tucked away in a quieter part of town. It's very easy to get to Rte 50, I-66 & I-395, so also a great location for those who drive everywhere. 
The November rent will be prorated (depending on when you take over the lease). The current lease ends on December 6th, with the option to renew the current lease. The deadline to renew the current lease is November 14th. The pricing for the renewal lease depends on how long you are looking to stay; they give you the option of 1-15 months. (The 12 month rate is $1,700) I can put you in touch with the leasing office to help you with the renewal process.

Description: This recently-renovated 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is on the 11th floor of an 18-story building. The unit includes a large private balcony and has great sunlight. The property features a new kitchen, renovated bathrooms, separate washer and dryer, dishwasher, and refrigerator with icemaker. One assigned parking space in garage is included. The hardwood floors are new and made of bamboo. The building has a pool, 24 hour front desk concierge, storage space, and a fitness room. Water and trash is included. This property is conveniently located just steps away from shops, restaurants and cafes and is 2 blocks from the Courthouse Metro (Orange Line).

Description:
Gorgeous renovated apartment within walking distance of Virginia Square Metro and all the perks of urban living! Park setting but oh so close to restaurants, bars, shops. Easy access to I-66, 495, Tyson's, DC.
Property Amenities:
*Updated chef's kitchen;
*Custom cabinets and closets with fresh white trim
*Lots of storage (rare for Arlington!)
*Hardwood floors throughout
*Air conditioning/heating (electric) in unit
*Cable/satellite TV
*Custom closets in the bedroom;
* Ceiling fans
* Tenants pay utilities
Sorry, no pets.
You don't want to miss this one! We self manage all of our properties - I promise that you will be satisfied with our service. The application process is simple and painless, there are no hidden fees or move-in fees. Give Cathy a call or text at 703-994-5367 if you'd like a tour or if you have questions.

Description:
Location, location, location!! Enjoy this sparkling, sun-filled 1 bed, 1 bath garden style apartment in the heart of Arlington and 5 minute walk to Virginia Square metro (Orange and Silver Lines). Safe neighborhood. Ten minute walk to Ballston Mall, restaurants, bars, and Arlington nightlife. 20 minute commute into the heart of downtown DC via metro. Access to Bikeshare and bus lines right off of Wilson Blvd. Sought-after area - don't wait!
Hardwood floors throughout, new stainless steel appliances, ceiling fans in each room, large granite island, and much more! Tenant responsible for gas and electric, landlord pays for water, trash and sewer. Sorry, no pets allowed.

Description:
Large condo for rent with 2 large bedrooms and a den that was previously used as a 3rd bedroom, along with 2 bathrooms. It's plenty of space for 2 to 3 people, with an open concept kitchen and living room with large windows and plenty of light. There is also a washer/dryer in the unit. 
Th building is a high end condo building with 24 hour concierge, a rooftop pool, gym, and FANTASTIC views of DC! GARAGE PARKING also comes with this rental at no additional charge. The location is walkable to Virginia Square and Ballston metros. 
About the bedrooms:
Master bedroom has 2 closets (w/ one walk-in) , en suite bathroom w/ shower and jacuzzi tub. Bedroom also has access to the large balcony that spans from the bedroom to the living room.
Large 2nd bedroom w/ great closets and great light as well. This bedroom is next to the other bathroom in the condo, where the W/D is. 
The den can be used as a third bedroom and can fit a full size bed,dresser, and end tables as it has before. The den is also next to the second bathroom in the condo. 
Pets are considered on case by case basis, and the property is available for rent immediately. It has been freshly painted, cleaned, and is ready for move in. Please contact Alison for questions or to view the property.

Description:
Luxury three-bedroom house in Arlington for rent Beautiful fully renovated house for rent in the heart of Arlington with the stunning location within the few minutes walk to Ballston metro, Ballston mall, restaurants, shops and grocery stores. This house located in the park with the Bluemont trail right at the back yard. On the main level enjoy big, bright living room that features huge windows, recess lights and home theater system; den, one bedroom and the kitchen with plenty of storage space and high end appliances, as well as large breakfast area. Two cozy bedrooms and the marble bath with luxury features and vanity as well as washer and dryer are on the second level. Large deck, surrounded with the rouse garden, allows you to enjoy outdoors from early spring to late fall. No neighbors on one of the sides, but the park, provides you with the privacy you need for the grill night or outdoor movie night (grill, patio furniture, outdoor movie screen and the speakers are provided). Hardwood floors, built-ins, recess lights and heated floors are small details which making your day to day life enjoyable and comfortable. Unfinished basement provides enough storage. Drive-way with parking for two cars makes your living in the heart of the city stress free. This house is beautifully designed and the option to rent it with the comfortable and quality furniture, designers windows treatments, flat screen TV and many other features is available. Whether you are looking for the place where you can move in with your tooth brush and enjoy it right away, or prefer to bring your own belongings, please contact us to schedule a showing and to discuss further details. 
Details - $3050/month with $3050 deposit 
- 6-12 month lease (lease can be extended after initial period)
- 1st month's rent and deposit to move in 
- tenant is responsible for ALL utilities 
- no more than two incomes to qualify
-no smoking in house 
- no pets 
- credit check is required! Applicant will be responsible for a $75 non-refundable application fee. 
- tenant must have an independent, good rental history (no eviction or late fees).
- tenant must provide reference from the previous landlords (no family or friend reference allowed). -tenant must provide proof of income

Description:
Beautiful 2 BR, 1 bath condo at Westview in Ballston available immediately. Completely updated condo is just steps to Ballston Metro, restaurants and shops. The secure building features rooftop pool, fitness center, lounge, business center, rooftop deck with grills, concierge and garage parking. 
Additional features include:
-Granite counters 
-stainless steel appliances 
-bamboo floors 
-huge master bedroom with walk in closet 
-washer/dryer in unit
-garage parking included
-ceramic tile 
-built in bookshelf 
-large covered balcony
-water, trash/recycle included in rent

Description: 1-Bedroom, 1-Bathroom apartment in the Ballston area available NOW! The apartment is an individually addressed 2-story townhouse-style unit in an 8-unit building near the intersection of Wilson Blvd and N Oakland St. Renovated in 2008 with parquet hardwood floors and central heat and a/c. This is a prime location only 3 minutes walking distance from the Virginia Square Metro station. One off-street parking spot is included with the lease, and you can get one FlexPass from the county which can be used for street parking for a 2nd car or for visitors. Washer/Dryer in unit. There is also a communal backyard area. This apartment is great for dogs with ground-level walk-out in front and back! Note: Kitchen pictures are from a different unit with a flipped floor plan. Picture of furnished bedroom from another unit is included for scale. Rent includes gas for hot water, water, trash, and common area maintenance such as landscaping and snow removal. Electric, gas for stove and TV/Internet are separate. Dogs are allowed for an additional $50 monthly fee and refundable pet deposit; sorry, no cats.

Description:
Gorgeous luxury 1 Bedroom, 1Bathroom, 729 Sqft condominium at Hawthorn. Includes 1 indoor dedicated parking spot, gourmet kitchen with granite counter-tops, maple finish cabinetry, designer lighting, luxurious bath, full size washer and dryer in unit, lots of closet space and nice balcony with a gorgeous view.This condo is a bright corner unit with LOTS of natural light. 1.5 blocks from Ballston Metro Station and Boston Commons Mall, 2 blocks from Virginia Square Metro Station and 100 feet from Gold's Gym in the heart of Arlington! Building facilities includes indoor gym, business center, 24/7 security entrance to the building and concierge with access to the resident-only courtyard. 
Neighborhood Description:
Arlington most celebrated neighborhoods surround you at The Hawthorn. Enjoy a variety of restaurants, major stores, theaters, and specialty boutiques. Linger in the local coffee shops, stroll through the Farmers Market, or visit a local park. Convenient location, walking distance to metro, shops, restaurants and bars. This condo is just minutes from DC, Route 66, Pentagon and Crystal City. 
1 year lease $1850
2 year lease $1750
One month security deposit required
Non-refundable $45 application fees

Images: ![Primary Photo - 1011 Arlington Blvd](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/Fx7Db3qErD85ca1j4CVGtP5IL4-M6W_B5DHIrodQZEY/110/1011-arlington-blvd-unit-217-arlington-va-primary-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 1011 Arlington Blvd](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/HuGV44B3BRClX97xVzsRAifUn6lVprGNsCH4NAVAk8s/118/1011-arlington-blvd-unit-217-arlington-va-building-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 1011 Arlington Blvd](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/BBX7o3JsDwbArK5id2UtpHl7djhtcuxvbEfNpN-SCNI/118/1011-arlington-blvd-unit-217-arlington-va-building-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 1011 Arlington Blvd](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/yfESBSSswcviZP8pdwYLh1IMUktMb9TDeW9IJcBfUOA/118/1011-arlington-blvd-unit-217-arlington-va-building-photo.jpg)
Description:
The rent for this great condo includes: a dedicated parking space, all utilities, a pool, a large fitness center and party room , wi-fi, 24-hour security, and a concierge. If you dont need the parking spot, then rent is only $1600.Enjoy a half-block walk to the Rosslyn Metro, and Georgetown is easy walking distance.
Large 2nd floor RENOVATED One Bedroom available mid September. 
Parking space included!!
All Utilities Included -individual heat and a/c controls 
and FREE WIFI! 
Concierge -7 days a week 
Newly renovated, 11,000 square foot on site Gym, Sauna, Steam Room, Showers
Olympic sized Pool and Lap Lanes, Large Tanning Decks, Bath House with Changing Rooms 
Outdoor Jacuzzi 
Gated Community with onsite Convenience Store(beer, wine and movies), and Dry Cleaners 
Restaurants, Safeway Grocery, Theater, Target, Banks, Fast Food all within a block or two. 
Close to Everything!!
These apartments are Northern Virginia and Washington DC's Best Kept Secret!!
River Place South is a gated community at the Potomac River near the Key Bridge and minutes from Georgetown. The Rosslyn Metro is one block away, Iwo Jima Park and Freedom Park are across the street and Roosevelt Island and Georgetown are within walking distance. Grocery, Drug Stores, Fast Food and Restaurants are just around the corner. There's a convenience store, valet and hair salon within the community.
Apartments INCLUDE All Utilities, High Speed Wireless Internet Access, Concierge Service (they'll accept your packages and greet your guests!), membership to our Fitness Center, Health Spa, outdoor Swimming pool and Jacuzzi. We have a Theater Room with large screen TV, Pool and Table Tennis as well as Sauna and Steam Rooms.

Description:
Sophisticated urban living & modern luxury located right in the heart of North Arlington's highly coveted Courthouse neighborhood. Absolutely amazing location just a few short steps to the Courthouse Metro station along the Orange Line corridor. Walk to everything including a wide array of restaurants, movie theaters, cafes, shops, etc. Just a quick walk to Clarendon, Rosslyn, and Georgetown!
Clean and very well maintained 2BR/2BA + BALCONY with bright and open layout. Stunning 10' floor-to-ceiling windows provide unparalleled and amazing panoramic views of Washington, DC right from the comfort of your own living room (including the Washington Monument, Washington Capitol, National Cathedral, etc.). Start your day by enjoying the calmness of a beautiful morning sunrise overlooking the city or sit back and relax while watching the 4th of July fireworks. This unit is located in the elegant and contemporary building known as "The Odyssey Condominium" which provides many great features including:
* 24-hour front desk concierge
* Resort-style living w/rooftop pool, lounge, and deck offering 360-degree views of DC and VA.
* Spacious state-of-the-art "Fitness Center" located on the penthouse level of the building including his/her Saunas
* Elegant lobby with electronic and controlled entry
* Business center
* On-site restaurant, "Sushi Rock"
* Beautifully landscaped exterior terrace with peaceful garden area
* Granite countertops and modern appliances
* Full-size stacked washer & dryer
* Raised maple wood kitchen cabinetry with nickel-finished knobs
* Designer light fixtures including recessed lighting in kitchen
* Fireplace with pre-wired cable connections for flat screen television
* Individually controlled central AC and heat
* Secured underground garage parking in building INCLUDES 1-reserved space - additional monthly parking available nearby if needed
* Tenant(s) only pays for electricity (water, trash/recycling included)
* Walk to an abundance of neighborhood restaurants from Clarendon to Rosslyn such as Fuego, The Cheesecake Factory, Ireland Four Courts, Ray's the Steaks, Cava, Faccia Luna, etc.
* Quick and easy access to both Reagan and Dulles Airport, Washington DC, Alexandria, and local highways (I-66, 395, Beltway 495, Arlington Boulevard), etc.
Only well-qualified applicant(s) with excellent credit and references will be considered. Please note that showings will be conducted by appointment only on a first-come, first-serve basis. We are seeking tenant(s) that will enjoy living in this great community and take great care of our property (sorry, no smoking and no pets allowed). Minimum lease term of 12-months will be considered, but a long-term lease of 24-months or longer would be preferred. The application process requires a $50-processing fee and security deposit of ($3600). Please feel free to contact us directly via email if you would like to setup an appointment or have any other questions. When responding, please be sure to provide both your day and evening phone numbers so that you can be easily reached. Thank you for your interest!

Description: Courthouse living at it's finest! Spacious corner unit condo for rent with tons of natural light. Unit features hardwood floors, open floor plan, kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances. Master suite with walk-in closet and large ensuite bath. Building amenities include concierge, gym, outdoor swimming pool and party room. Parking space included in rent. Pet friendly!

Description: The best price in the area for an essentially all but new unit just 3-ish blocks from DC Metro, Pentagon City and Row and Centre, a Super location. 2 bedrooms - 2 new baths. Featuring: The Best Sound Stopping Windows Ever. Freshly Painted, Beautiful vertical window treatments & new carpet just installed. Awesome kitchen w/separate entrance, new appliances and floor, separate dining area. Huge balcony spans the entire unit- access from all living spaces. Ample closets, all w/new sliding mirrored doors Fantastic views, roof top deck for 4th of July, And, best off all Garage Parking & all Utilities Incl. Plus Pool, Tennis, and on-site convenience store. Asking $2495 - OBO Call Ben Gehrig 301 523-0505 / Fairfax Realty, Inc. 703 752-3700

Description:
Beautifully updated one Bedroom apt in River Place North (6TH floor) in Rosslyn. 
	-716 sq ft with balcony overlooking freedom park
	-Plenty of closet space, big windows
	-Remodeled kitchen with dishwasher and granite countertop, new floor tile
	-Remodeled Bathroom
	-Walking Distance to Georgetown, DC
	-Two blocks from Rosslyn metro Station
	-Amenities include a resort style swiming pool, 
		Jacuzzi, health club/gym, sauna/steam rooms, 
		24 hour security gate, full-service and front-desk conceige, 
		food market. 
		Community center/Recreation center. 
	- all amenities, utilities and WIFI included
- Partially finished upon moving in

Description:
Incredible location, beautiful condo. This 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo is located a short walk from the Rosslyn and Courthouse metro stops. It features vaulted ceilings, hardwood floors, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, and a washer/dryer in unit. The condo includes a large patio off the courtyard perfect for entertaining/summer grilling and one parking spot. 
The building has a property manager/concierge on site, super cleaning staff, 24-hour gym, lounge/party room with WiFi, bike storage, garage parking for guests, and courtyard with fire pit. In a great neighborhood, the building is walking distance to Clarendon, Georgetown, the Theodore Roosevelt island, and the Mount Vernon Trail. Easy access to the Orange Line as well as interstates 66 and 395, the GW Parkway, and Rock Creek Parkway. 
The condo is pre-wired for FiOS and cable. Pets allowed with prior approval.

Description:
Newly updated 3 bedroom end-unit in sought after Ballston Gardens community! Steps away from Ballston Metro and upcoming renovated Ballston Commons Mall, Harris Teeters, Golds Gym, popular dining and bar spots. All utilities are INCLUDED. Washer/dryer IN UNIT. 
Hardwood floors throughout, lots of windows and natural light, upscale chef's kitchen, air conditioning/heating through modern LG equipment, ceiling fans, cable/satellite TV, dishwasher, disposal, parking available, fitness room, club room.
We self manage all our properties so your future housing experience is backed by our outstanding service. The application process is simple and painless, there are no hidden fees or move-in fees. Give Cathy a call or text if you'd like a property tour, or have further questions: 703-994-5367.

Description:
Luxurious apartment available to rent just steps away from the Ballston metro. Huge living room / dining room plus a den for added space. In unit washer/dryer and AC. Apartment has a ton of space and is filled with light. The unit comes with a garage parking space in the building. 
Building has great amenities. Full gym, pool available throughout the summer, complimentary grills, mail room to collect packages, door man. 
We will leave kitchen supplies (pots/pans, plates, mugs, silverware, etc.) if interested.

Fitness Center, pool, convenient store, tot lot, and concierge all on site. Gas, Electric, and Water Utilities all included. Two blocks from the metro. Walking distance to Georgetown, DC landmarks, and restaurants/ shopping.

Description:
A superb studio with a separate full kitchen in the ulta-convenient, highly popular, River Place South building, minutes from DC by metro, bus or foot.
River Place is a leafy, resort-style complex, two blocks from the Rosslyn metro. Gleaming bamboo hardwood floor, 32-inch wall-mounted flat panel TV, Carerra marble bathroom vanity, Wi-Fi and in-house fitness center with late-model equipment. Sunny with huge wall-to-wall picture window, walk-in closet and built-in oak-clad bookcases. Fully furnished in contemporary style and fully equipped with kitchenware and linens. The unit, #744, is 406 square feet and includes a separate, full, tiled kitchen with granite counters, under-cabinet lighting and new (2016) Whirlpool "White Ice" dishwasher(URL HIDDEN)
From the apartment, you may walk across the picturesque Key Bridge in minutes to D.C.'s trendy Georgetown neighborhood of ethnic restaurants, lively bars and busy nightlife. Everything is at your fingertips here -- it's ultra convenient for working or studying in Washington D.C. and surrounding areas. Also in walking distance is Theodore Roosevelt Island, an 88.5-acre nature preserve in the Potomac crisscrossed by nature trails and boardwalk that transports you from the urban environment. Zipcar and Capital Bikeshare stations are within a few minutes' walk.
The building, known as River Place South, is part of a gated community. A concierge is on duty in an upscale lobby. Community amenities include a resort-style outdoor pool with lap lanes and Jacuzzi-like hot whirlpool. Also featured: an in-house health club with late-model cardio and strength equipment; an on-site grocery store (open until at least 11 p.m. on weekdays and midnight on weekends), hair salon and dry cleaners.
On-site parking may be available @ $125 per month.
Early check-in also may be available. If so, we're happy to accommodate.
Washer/dryers are on the building's first floor, operated with quarters or debit card. The renovated laundry room features machines so cutting-edge that they can text you when a load is finished.

Description: Great location 1210 N Taft St., 2 blocks from Arlington Courthouse Metro, Arlington Farmer's Market Saturday's, AMC Theatre. Whole Foods & great restaurants within walking distance. Free parking in building lot for up to 2 vehicles. Several laundry rooms in building. Secured building access, on-site building management, unit looks out on greenspace. Pool area secured & in separate greenspace with clubhouse. Partially furnished option available.

Description: This conveniently located two floor, two bedroom apartment for rent is available for occupants now in Ballston. Located on the top floor of a popular mid-rise building across the street from Metro, the apartment has abundant natural light and has been recently updated with new appliances, carpet and paint. The upstairs master bedroom is generously sized with two large closets and an en-suite master bath and laundry. Downstairs is a large living area, with enough space for table, chairs and sofa, a kitchen with granite countertop and breakfast bar and filtered water tap. A second bedroom with closet and bathroom are also on the downstairs level and offer privacy from the main living area. The balcony is under roof so is an ideal place to have coffee or dinner. Building amenities include use of a social/party room, pool and grill area. The apartment includes one garage parking space in the building.

Description: Condo in Ballston (N. Arlington) with magnificent balcony views of Washington Monument, DC, and Alexandria. Unit is large 2 bedroom 2 bath + den totaling 1,254 sf. Unit is on 17th floor with unobstructed views. 2 reserved parking spots in garage. Walkable to Ballston and Virginia Square metro stations on Orange Line. One block from Ballston Mall which is currently undergoing significant renovations to the mall. Amenities include rooftop pool, rooftop terrace, rooftop gym, courtyard with two gas grills, party room, and 24 hour security in Lobby. Walkable to many retail restaurants and stores. Asking price is $3,350 per month. Sewer and water is included in rent. All other utilities are paid directly by tenant. Available immediately. Pets allowed on a case by case basis for a small additional fee.

Images: ![Primary Photo - 1021 N Garfield St](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/BRyFmGEr0EMhL7Z1sk7A1X-8nXdulL3yOvTHk7MVfnY/110/1021-n-garfield-st-unit-721-arlington-va-primary-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 1021 N Garfield St](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/6bFo5aCfe5tkiu2ed_mp2w7NceviipfsWppFi2Se-A0/118/1021-n-garfield-st-unit-721-arlington-va-building-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 1021 N Garfield St](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/mkuit_JG2LbCUckqY6EtXRqRgw6wXkIV4xUgYKM7ncY/118/1021-n-garfield-st-unit-721-arlington-va-building-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 1021 N Garfield St](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/EPnemIQX98zDO5BB3fgvwVWsnnlHTWEyBVtcmy9dIeI/118/1021-n-garfield-st-unit-721-arlington-va-building-photo.jpg)
Description:
Security deposit and 1st months rent due at lease signing 
1 parking spot included 
No amenities fee
No pet fee
CONDO: 
*840 sqft sunny higher floor condo facing courtyard on Filmore (quiet side of bldg, street and neighborhood)
*Open floor plan NOT chopped up in tiny rooms making living space awkward
*Able to create a master suite with sitting area/desk in bedroom 
*Large walk-in closet in the bedroom
*Able to fit a dining table in the living room 
*In-unit washer/dryer
*Pets allowed on a case by case basis
*No smoking in condo
BUILDING and NEIGHBORHOOD:
*Renovated gym; Rooftop bbq grills, pool and hot tub (hot tub open all year) 
*Rooftop with amazing views of Monument and Capital Bldg 
*Secure underground garage parking and 24 hour front desk
*Packages, Onsite Maintenance and Common Space reservation via BuildingLink App 
*Two blocks from Clarendon metro station
*Walking distance to Whole foods, Trader Joe's and CVS
*Located in heart of Clarendon with bars, restaurants and night life
*Easy commute to Pentagon, Crystal City, Alexandria, and DC 
*Quick access to I-395, I-66, and Route 50

Description:
AVAILABLE AUGUST 1st, 2017
Basement apartment. Kitchen door leads to a fenced in back yard. Pets are welcome but there is a non refundable pet deposit and monthly fee. Closet space is sufficient. Utility room contains a washer and dryer. Gas hot forced air heat and Central air conditioning. 
Bus to Ballston in front of home (5 minutes). Bus to Rossyln a few blocks away on Lee Highway. Great location. Shoppes, Banks, Restaurants, Bus line, Marymount University.
1 - 2 year lease, 1 month security deposit.
Rest of house rented by group of coeds.
I would prefer to show the house during the day so that I don't bother the tenants. However, if that's not possible, I will try to arrange a time after work hours. Nice solid brick older colonial home.

Description:
This stunning River Place apartment has just been beautifully renovated and professionally decorated. All the furniture is stylish and brand-new. All utilities are included including cable and internet. It has a 40 inch flatscreen TV mounted on the wall of the living room and a 32" one in the bedroom. Furnishings include all kitchenware, dishes, coffee-maker, toaster, microwave, TV, iron, ironing board, etc. Just bring your suitcase!
River Place is wonderful complex with many amenities including an extra-large, resort-style pool, spa, a state of the art fitness center, sauna, steam room, convenience market, hair salon, and drycleaner. Each building has a concierge. The complex is gated and very secure, located in an upscale neighborhood. 
The location is fantastic: a block and half from the Rosslyn Metro. It is near the Iwo Jima Monument, walking distance over the Key Bridge into Georgetown, near the jogging and biking trails along the Potomac River, near DC, and near many restaurants, drugstores, and markets. It Is part of booming, exciting Rosslyn, gateway to DC.
You can learn more about River Place by going its website: www.riverplaceeast.com
Youll love my place because of the location and the coziness and its beauty. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Description: If spaciousness, location and parking matter this is the apartment for you! 1 bedroom + 1 bath condominium in a modern renovated, boutique style building in Courthouse/Rosslyn area. Stroll to popular downtown Arlington bars, restaurants and shops. Two metro stops are within walking distance or use the Capital bike share around the corner. The beautiful Iwo Jima park, Arlington Cemetery and bike paths to Georgetown and Mt. Vernon are in your backyard. Kitchen has granite countertops, maple cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. Wood floors in living room and bedroom. Great light and 4 generous closets with professional shelving. Unit includes 1 dedicated parking space and a basement storage cage. Utilities included. Building features roof deck, laundry room w/front loading washers & dryers, bike storage, workout room and meeting room. Pets on a case-by-case basis (management charges an annual pet fee, not the unit owner).

Description:
Upper unit in The Arlington available Sunday, Nov. 5, 2017. Negotiable lease terms, open to 6 mos or more. 
Open house Saturday, Sept. 23, 10:30-12:30. 
Kitchen has granite countertops and high wooden cabinets, tons of storage! Also, a rarity in Arlington units, this one offers a full dishwasher. Kitchen window looks out on large porch in private area. You see only trees! Ideal spot for morning coffee and reading a book or the newspaper. Kitchen has hardwood floors. Living room is spacious, with large window. Also attached is huge storage closet which easily holds numerous coats, (big bulky ones too), golf clubs, vacuum cleaner and tons of boxes (we know, we have filled it to capacity and then some). Wood burning fireplace to keep you warm in the winter and ceiling fan which helps keep you cool in summer if you don't want to use AC. Berber carpet throughout living room and other rooms in the house. Two bedrooms. Both have ceiling fans. First bedroom is large with HUGE walk-in closet, as well as linen closet. Window is partially covered by tree so helps provide shade so you can sleep, or have windows open and hear some of the birds in the area. Second bedroom is smaller, but easily fits a bed and other items. Decent size closet. Washer and Dryer in unit are practically new, just installed in 2014. Express Bus to Pentagon stops steps away from your door. To give you an idea, I would leave at 8:49 to catch 8:50 bus and be at my desk drinking coffee in Metro Center by 9:30, sometimes earlier! Rent includes two parking spots. Downtown Shirlington is a thriving area with restaurants, theaters and a Harris Teeter. It is a 12 minute walk. There are numerous trails in the area for walking and running, as well as tons of playgrounds near by. One of the largest dog parks in the area is a 10 minute walk down Walter Reed. We are less than 3 miles from the Mark Center and almost immediately off of 395. Military discount available. Available for viewing upon request. Thanks for interest! Look forward to hearing from you.

Description:
Make this 560sq ft FULLY FURNISHED and updated 1BR your new home this Fall, just bring your suitcases! Available Sep 15.
Deposit equivalent of 1 month rent is due at lease signing; Short-term welcome with additional rent. 
* Updated open kitchen with high-end granite counter, cherry cabinetry and SS GE appliances, under-mount sink with designer Grohe faucet.
* Brazilian cherry hardwood in the living/dining room, solid oak hardwood in bedroom.
* Updated bath
* Stylish contemporary furniture and decor, 42" Samsung flat screen TV and Philips DVD player.
* Bed & bath linens, kitchen-ware and small appliances (coffee maker, toaster, iron, vacuum) are provided. 
* 3 closets: walk-in closet by the entrance, a linen closet by the bathroom, and a bedroom closet with sliding doors. 
* Beautiful views of manicured grounds, ponds, red Japanese bridge and spa; monument view through the trees 
* Utilities included, except phone & internet
* Gym/Fitness/pool/jacuzzi/sauna accessible with resident registration 
* Sorry no dogs/cats per community rules
www.RiverPlaceEast.com.
Credit check fee is payable by the tenant, unless you can supply recent credit report. ID + Employment proof or last 2 paychecks or fund proof required for application.

Description:
Charming 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom single family home with finish basement! 
This fully renovated 3 level house is located in the quiet neighborhood of Nauck, Arlington, VA. Lots of natural light. Parking for up to 3 cars, fenced yard with patio. Granite kitchen and open floor plan, family room, dining room, living room, master bedroom with walk-in closet, double vanity and original hardwood floors. FIOS ready! A must see!
Location: 
Close to shopping & dining atShirlington Village. Easy access to I-395, I-66, Pentagon, & 20 minutes to downtown DC. 10-minutes to Ronald Reagan Airport, 10-minutes to Pentagon City Metro Station, 3 blocks to a Park / Playground and two blocks to Metro bus 10B, 23A, 23B, 23T and Art 84.
Lease Terms: 
Available immediately. Minimum one-year lease. Pets are considered on a case by case basis. 1-month rent deposit required.
Parking: Driveway for three cars. Additional free off-street parking available.
Utilities: 
All utilities paid by tenant (water, electricity and internet).

Description: Cozy, spacious two-story home. Four bedrooms, two full bathrooms, plus barroom (or spare bedroom). Central A/C. Washer and dryer in-unit. Two fireplaces. Off-street parking (two spaces) and on-street parking (Zone 8; $25 per year). Fifteen minute walk from Ballston Metro station. Hardwood throughout top floor, ceramic tiles throughout ground floor. Spacious front yard.

Description: The Palatine features beautifully designed apartments with upscale finishes and luxury amenities to make you feel at home. Ideally located in Arlington, VA, with close proximity to major DC landmarks and just a few blocks from the Courthouse Metro station, The Palatine offers easy access to high-end shopping, notable restaurants and entertainment. The wonderful balance of nearby office, retail and hotel options coupled with a successful blend of urban sophistication and neighborhood charm foster a thriving and energetic lifestyle in a highly sought after location to live, work and play.

Monthly Fees: * Trash Removal, Sewer: Included

* Admin Fee: $400
* Application Fee: $50

Features:

Services:

Description: Thomas Place is a 100% smoke free urban village community featuring 3 and 4 bedrooms. This property is 2 blocks to the Ballston Common Mall, which offers excellent shopping, restaurants, movie theaters and an ice skating rink. Amenities featured in these residences include a PRECOR exercise facility with state of the art cardio theater and strength equipment and fully equipped kitchens with electric smooth-top range, microwave, frost free refrigerator, icemaker, dishwasher and disposal. Come experience this convenient community, Because Where You Live Matters.

Monthly Fees: * Unassigned Garage Parking: $100
One Time Fees:
* Amenity Fee: $200
* Admin Fee: $300
* Application Fee: $50
Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
Accepts pets with breed restrictions. $300 refundable deposit and $300 non-refundable pet fee, $55 per dog per month and $45 per cat per month.
Features:
* Washer/Dryer
* Heating
* Cable Ready
* Storage Units
* Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)
Lease Info: 3 months, 4 months, 5 months, 6 months, 7 months, 8 months, 9 months, 10 months, 11 months, 12 months, 13 months

Description: Located in the vibrant hub of Arlington, just minutes from Ballston, Clarendon, Crystal City, Old Town Alexandria and Washington DC, the upscale one- and two-bedrooms apartments of Siena Park have been crafted for those who want more. It begins the moment you step into this architecturally striking mid-rise, and a soaring 20-foot stylishly grand lobby immediately calls to your attention. Design elements that complement the greater whole await you at every turn, including the inviting lobby lounge adorned with contemporary reflectional art commissioned specifically for Siena Park by Dallas artist JD Miller. If life truly imitates art, Siena Park is a masterpiece. Picture yourself in these brand-new, mixed-use Arlington apartment residences. Each new upscale apartment residence is designed to make every entrance something special, with an exceptional collection of of fine features and finishes gracing your home. Equally artful is our selection of amenities, which were created for with highest level of relaxation, entertainment, personal convenience and aesthetic beauty in mind. *Specials are subject to change based on market availability and current market values.

* 200 lb Weight Limit

Description: If you're looking for the warmth of a friendly community with convenient access to an exciting metropolitan area, then look no further than Park Shirlington Apartments. These comfortable apartments for rent in Arlington, VA offer extra storage room and an on-site laundry in every building. Electric is included in your rent. You'll enjoy our scenic picnic areas, playground and large community pool. * Park Shirlington Apartments are just minutes from Old Town Alexandria, the Pentagon and the plentiful shops and fine restaurants of Shirlington Village. The express Metro can take you to downtown Washington, DC and the Metrorail Stations, or you can quickly access I-395 to get to your destination! If you'd like more information, call or visit today. We'll be happy to answer all of your questions and some of our staff members are also fluent in Spanish.

Description: This sister community to Rosslyn Heights, Rosslyn Vue is an intimate, newly renovated single building featuring 45 luxury residences in a premier Rosslyn location. At Rosslyn Vue you can walk to Rosslyn and Courthouse Metro Stations and is minutes from major transportation routes I-66, I-395, Lee Highway, Route 50, Key Bridge/Georgetown and Connecticut Avenue in DC. Rosslyn Vue features residences with spacious interiors and updated interior appointments that busy professionals expect. Rosslyn Vue residents share Rosslyn Heights' amenities featuring a Rec Center with Cyber Cafe, fitness center, two seasonal swimming pools, a picnic area and business center to help you relax and rejuvenate! Be enlightened. Find your Zen at Rosslyn Vue.

Description: AVAILABLE OCTOBER 16 2017 --Elegant 2 BR renovated condo for rent in Arlington. Hardwood floors and beautiful kitchen with backsplash built-in recessed lights and ceramic floors. Balcony w/views of treetops many closets & garage space. Residents enjoy a large gym sauna outdoor pool dog park walking/running trails. Minutes to Shirlington Harris Teeter Library & Shops. Close to 395 and commuter routes.

Great lower level recreation room with gas fireplace. Snow removal landscaping and trash removal included in rent. Must apply online and pay your rent online. 5 Short-term additional parking spaces avail. in complex.

Description: Completely renovated 2017: New Kitchen New Stainless Steel Appliances New update bathrooms New Lighting Newly refinished hardwood floors freshly painted throughout More!!! Tucked away in a quite cul-de-sac directly across the street from park. One-Car attached garage with new garage door. Only 7 Blocks to Crystal City Metro and restaurants. 15-20 min drive to Old Town VA. A must see!!!

Spacious living room hardwood floors crown molding. Upgraded kitchen. All marble MBA. Indoor/Outdoor pools Exercise room. Party room. Walk to Metro Pentagon City...

Description: Fantastic deal on this lovely bright and spacious 15th floor 2br/2ba corner unit at The Continental! Spectacular views of DC and the National Cathedral from private balcony! Nice open kitchen with island and breakfast bar. Walk-in closets gas fireplace and stacked washer/dryer. 1 parking space included. Rooftop pool and fitness center! Steps from everything! Offered furnished. 2 blocks to metro.

Description: Large 1 bedroom in great location. Close to Pentagon Shirlington. Metro bus at corner. Rent incl. all util. except cable phone. Secured entry 24 hr. front desk. New appliances paint carpet updated bath. Nice view from balcony. Convenience store on site tons of parking reserved parking avail. Pool tennis gym party room. Bike trail runs along front of building. No smoking. Good credit req.

Description: Absolutely bright & gorgeous newer house in sought after location. Kitchen w/ updated appliances.Great open floor plan and plenty of space on all levels. Relax on large private deck. Two car garage & two driveway parking spaces. Close to conveniences - metros restaurants shopping. Yorktown school district. Bus nearby and DC just minutes away - easy commute to I66 I395 I495 & GW Parkway.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Ample outdoor space for entertaining. Rent below market rate! Pets allowed on a case by case basis.

The updated island kitchen is spacious with breakfast area & adjoins den or dining room. Fully fenced private yard with brick patio. Unfinished lower level. Fantastic location min to DC and steps from dining & shopping.

Description: Stunning open floor plan 3BR/2.5BA top floor corner unit condo at Courthouse Hill! Spacious living room w/gas fireplace large dining room plantation shutters remodeled kitchen with granite floors & counters. Hardwood throughout (Brazilian cherry walnut & bamboo). Private balcony and 2 garage parking spots. Steps to Metro shops nightlife etc. Community has a pool. MUST SEE TO APPRECIATE!

Lovely courtyard setting.

Private entrance on each level. Large rooms. Easy access to I-395. All in a park like sitting. Washer/dryer. Very nice condition with a few more tweaks being done to make this your home.

Description:
(703) 627-9547 - Largest townhouse in Fairlington (2,145 square feet) with 3 bedrooms and 3 baths. On cul-de-sac  mile from Village at Shirlington. Gourmet kichen. All 3 baths fully renovated. $140,000 in upgrades. LR--DRkitchenBRfull BAwalk out patio on first floor; 2 BRs--full BA on second floor; large rec roomwet barfull BAden (or 4th BR) on lower level. Rent includes HOA-provided services (2 off street parking spaces in rear, pools and tennis courts, grounds maintenance, community events, water, sewer, trash, etc.) while tenant pays for electric (and cable/phone services). High efficiency windows and HVAC unit for low electric bills. One block from Metro/ART bus stop and near major roads. Within walking distance to the Village at Shirlington with shopping, library, theaters, popular restaurants, Harris Teeter, and more. Near parks, bike trails, Capital Bikeshare station. Monthly rent $2,950. One year minimum lease. Available January 1, 2018. Contact Steve at 703-627-9547 or huntoon@comcast.net.

Description:
(202) 294-2365 - Gorgeous 2 beds 2 baths +den condo in Ballston VA - Property Id: 32860
Beautiful and pristine large 2 bedrooms 2 baths + den +balcony rental in high end building with 24 hour full service concierge. Furnished upscale condo with granite, stainless steel and gleaming hardwoods throughout. Expansive bright living room with floor to ceiling window and access to balcony overlooking the courtyard. 
Amenities include rooftop pool, rooftop terrace, rooftop gym, courtyard with two gas grills, party/club room. Convenient location, 5-minute walk to Ballston metro, 7-minute walk to Virginia Square metro, and easy on off to I-66 and US-50. Blocks away from Clarendon, Rosslyn, Georgetown, and DC. Walkable to many retails, restaurants and shops. 
Owner pays for sewer, water, and trash. Tenant pays for all other utilities. Pets allowed for additional fee on case by case basis.
Can be rented as unfurnished ($3,050) or furnished ($3,250).
*Rent and move-in date negotiable
Apply at TurboTenant: http://rent.turbotenant.com/properties/888-n-quincy-street 
Property Id 32860
(RLNE3558402) Other Amenities - Other- Cable Ready, Exercise Facility. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Other- Freezer, Microwave. Lease lengths - 12 Months. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Water Included, Trash Pick-up Included. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

(571) 502-3070 - Spacious Updated 3-Level Townhome at Ballston Metro! - Walk to METRO! Beautifully updated Ballston Townhome, 3 levels above grade * Open eat-in kitchen with granite, gas fireplace, ceramic tile floors, lots of cabinet space, butler's pantry with 2nd sink * Separate dining room with hardwood floor could be a parlor * 2 Master Bedrooms with ENSUITE baths * Georgetown-style patio with gas grill. Rent INCLUDES water, sewer, landscaping, parking space * Wired for FIOS. No Smoking, no pets. $100 move-in fee. Attention groups: 3rd bedroom has no access to full bath from hallway. 1 month FREE RENT for 18 to 21 month lease!!!

Dog Friendly!
Charming 2 bedroom, 1 bath townhome located in Farlington. The entire house has been updated. Kitchen features stainless steel appliances and ceramic cooktop. White shaker cabinets with retro look ceramic tile. Wood floor has been refinished. Wood blinds throughout. Even has 2 sets of washers/dryers, front load and top load. Ample closet space throughout. 
Resident receives parking passes to park in dedicated parking literally steps from front door. 
Resident also has full use of all community amenities including pool, tennis courts, etc. 
Mins to Pentagon, DC and everything the area offers. Metrobus and Metrorail nearby. 
Application process includes application, credit check, background check and security deposit.

Description:
(301) 327-0500 - Arlington 2 Bedroom Townhouse - Incredible Location and Value, Deck - Dog friendly!
Charming 2 bedroom, 1 bath townhouse in Fairlington. Features new kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Kitchen has ceramic tile and large pantry. Hardwood floor has been refinished like new. Entire home has been professionally painted. Energy efficient front load washer and dryer. Even the HVAC is new and under professional contract for service. Unique side deck with views of beautiful tree and shrub lined space. Includes 2 parking passes. Location is at end of a secluded cul-de-sac across from the pool, tennis courts, etc. Residents have full access to community amenities. 
Master bedroom is large with 2 closets. 2nd bedroom with 1 closet. Other closet spaces include hall linen closet, foyer closet, walk in kitchen pantry and a few others. 
Fantastic commuting location with loads of public transportation (Metrorail and Metrobus). 9 mins to the Pentagon. Easy access to everything. 
Approval process includes application, credit and criminal background, security deposit.
No Cats Allowed
(RLNE3506753) Other Amenities - Parking, Other- tennis, park, metrobus, dog friendly, Pool. Appliances - Washer & Dryer On-Site. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(703) 709-2264 - GORGEOUS! REMODELED FROM TOP TO BOTTOM! - GORGEOUS! REMODELED FROM TOP TO BOTTOM! STAINLESS STEEL KIT APPLIANCES*UPGRADED BATHS W/CERAMIC TILES,HARDWOOD FLRS ON MAIN LVL*POSSIBLE 3RD BR ON LOWER LVL*COMMUTERS DREAM, NEAR METRO,I-66,I-395,CLOSE TO PENTAGON & SHOPPING! OVER 1600 SQ FT. FRESHLY PAINTED*NEW CARPETS*Pets CBC 1 sm pet*
AVAIL 8.22.17
Features: Pentagon and Pentagon City metro stops (blue & yellow lines) are 1.5 mile away, Ballston metro (orange line) is 2 miles. A bus running up George Mason will take you to Ballston metro in eight minutes. The restaurants on Columbia Pike are excellent, esp. Bangkok 54. Barcroft Recreation center on Four Mile Run is less than a mile and has excellent fitness classes for all ages, as well as a gym. At Penrose Square (less than one mile) are a brand new Giant and an excellent yoga studio. W&OD bike trail is just under one mile. Across the street at Westmont Gardens apartment complex is a pool you can join for the summer for a fraction of the usual cost of a pool membership in NoVa; excellent pool for children, not crowded. Bus stops on Columbia Pike serve Arlington's busiest bus line, down Columbia Pike to both Pentagon metro and Pentagon City. Excellent service during rush hour.
(RLNE3490842) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

"Rare end unit townhome with large. private front yard, fenced back yard w/patio. Partial kitchen redo.
Corian counters. Recent microwave. Appliances also include fridge, stove, dishwasher, full washer and dryer. Energy efficient heat pump. New flooring basement & kitchen. LL bath is a new remodel. Fresh paint in LL family rm. and guest suite. New lighting throughout. Walk to shopping."
Real Property Management Pros

Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
Fully furnished, renovated 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom house with a small study in Arlington. Located in the Ashton Heights neighborhood of Arlington, restaurants, shopping, groceries and entertainment are within a short walk. The Foreign Services Institute (FSI) is just 10 blocks. The home features a front porch and back patio. The living room has hardwood floors and a sleeper sofa for guests.  Plenty of bookshelves and a desk for remote working adorn the small office. The remodeled kitchen has stainless steel appliances, gas stove, Travertine counter tops and all the tools needed for cooking. The master bedroom offers a queen bed while the 2nd bedroom has a full size bed.  This property includes central air conditioning and in unit washer/dryer. The Virginia Square Metro Station (orange line) is just 2.5 blocks. Walk Score: 92 (Walkers Paradise), Transit Score: 69, Bike Score: 80.
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Dec 02, 2017.
-
With its own private balcony and great sunlight, this recently-renovated 1 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom apartment is on the 15th floor of an 18-story building. The property features a new kitchen with birch cabinets, silestone counters and renovated bathrooms. The hardwood floors are new and made of bamboo. The building has a pool, front desk concierge and a fitness room. This property is conveniently located just steps away from shops, restaurants and cafes and is 2 blocks from the Courthouse Metro (Orange Line). Please note:  This building has a six month minimum lease term.  Walk score: 92, Transportation score: 71, Bike score: 74!
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Jan 18, 2018.
-
This 1,309 square foot house sits on a 6,780 square foot lot and features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The house is 2 stories plus a finished basement. The main floor includes a full office in one room, the master bedroom and bath, a proper dining room, kitchen, and living room. Just off the living room there is a large screened in porch and very large fenced in yard with patio, seating, and grill perfect for entertaining, plus parking included in rent! The basement has with a TV area with a large comfortable sofa, a bedroom, bathroom, and separate laundry room. This beautiful home has designer furnishings and lots of character. It truly feels like home.
Nearby schools include Technical Education & Career Center, Randolph Elementary School and Henry Elementary School. The closest grocery stores are Central Market, Mia's Market & Deli and Asni Supermarket & Hot Coffee. Nearby coffee shops include Dunkin' Donuts, Ethio Cafe and Twisted Vines Bottleshop & Bistro. Nearby restaurants include The Corner Tex Mix, Rincome Thai Cuisine and Panda Bowl Restaurant. 1420 S Walter Reed Dr is near Monroe Park, Pike Park and Cleveland Park. There are excellent bike lanes and the terrain is flat as a pancake. 1420 S Walter Reed Dr is very bikeable, biking is convenient for most trips. Bike sharing is available from Capital Bikeshare.
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Dec 17, 2017.
-
Very large fully furnished, renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom home is the largest in our inventory at more than 1700 square feet! The unit is half of a two unit building and features a small side patio and 20ft ceilings in the living room.  Located in the walkable neighborhood of Rosslyn, with restaurants, shopping, groceries, transporation options, and entertainment within a 10-minute walk. The proeprty features a completely renovated kitchen and bathroom, gas fireplace, queen size bed, central air conditioning, and in unit washer and dryer. The remodeled kitchen has stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, gas stove, and granite counter tops. The Rosslyn Metro Station (orange/blue lines) is just a 7 minute walk. Walk Score: 85 (Very Walkable), Transit Score: 73, Bike Score: 75. Driveway parking option available for a fee. 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.
