Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
Live in luxury in this fully furnished spacious 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom condo in one of the most desirable zip codes in Arlington! Plus, monthly cleanings included at no charge! This modern condo features high end furnishings, open floor plan, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, a gas stove, in-unit washer and dryer, central air condition, HDTV, and more. This property has two full bathrooms plus a half bath. The bedrooms each have queen size beds and ensuite bathrooms. The master suite bathroom features shower and separate soaker tub. 
Enjoy this walkable location just one block to the Clarendon Metro (Orange Line), and endless shopping options, including Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, Barnes and Noble, Apple Store, Washington Sports Club, tons of restaurants, and so much more. Walk Score rates this property a "walkers paradise". This modern building was constructing in 2005 and amenities include a front desk during business hours, fitness center, two outdoor swimming pools, business center, and a club room with a pool table, bar and TVs. Plus there is garage parking, extra storage space and bike storage available (subject to fees). A Gold’s Gym resides in the commercial space on the ground level.
Click To Inquire About This Property

This property is conveniently located just steps away from shops, restaurants and cafes in central Arlington. This is another property with HDTV! Description:
Available Dec 26, 2017.
-
Fully furnished 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom 22nd floor condo with panoramic views of Georgetown and DC from the floor to ceiling windows. This sunny condo has all the highend finishes you could want. The condo features include central air conditioning and heat, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, dishwasher, washer and dryer, hardwood floors, queen size bed, and HDTV.
Luxury building which includes concierge, room service until 10pm from the adjoining Le Meridien Hotel plus hotel room discounts for guests (booked through the hotel), fitness center, lounge, and a large shared roof deck with expansive views of DC and the river plus grills and patio seating. Conveniently located directly across the bridge from Georgetown and across the street from the Rosslyn metro (Orange, Blue and Silver line metros). Garage parking for two cars are available for an additional fee.
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
This fully-furnished, renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom offers relaxing views of Arlington and the Potomac from the living room and bedroom. Located just opposite the National Mall along the Potomac River, Rosslyn offers convenient access to the nation’s capital, Arlington's most famous landmarks and the National Airport. It has many restaurants and shops plus is an easy walk to Georgetown. The condo features a renovated kitchen equipped with a gas stove, granite counter tops and all the tools needed for cooking. The building features a front desk concierge that takes care of packages and other resident services, a fitness center and swimming pool. The fitness center is a newly renovated 7,000 square-foot facility that offers steam room, sauna, weights, state-of-the-art exercise equipment, pool tables and ping pong. The swimming pool is a large resort-style pool with lap lanes and a burbling, hot whirlpool in a Japanese-style rock garden setting. There is also an early-opening late-closing grocery store, coin operated laundry room, hair salon and professional dry cleaners on the premises. It is 1.5 blocks from the Rosslyn Metro Station (Orange/Blue Line - direct to the Pentagon, Reagan National Airport, Foggy Bottom, downtown DC, Federal Triangle and Capitol). Parking is available. Walk Score: 69 (Somewhat Walkable), Transportation Score: 67, Bike Score: 81.
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Jun 02, 2018.
-
Live in luxury with this 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom 15th floor condo with city views from the floor to ceiling windows. Enjoy room service from the Le Meredien Hotel and concierge services. The condo has all the high end finishing you could want including queen beds in both rooms and a walk-in closet. The building amenities include a state of the art fitness center, lounge and a large shared roof deck with grills and views of DC. Conveniently located directly across the bridge from Georgetown and across the street from the Rosslyn metro (Orange, Blue and Silver line metros). Cleaning service included every two weeks. Garage parking for one car.

Have it all with this Luxury 1 bedroom, plus Den condo. This custom renovated condo has all the highend finishes you could want, plus enjoy room service from the Le Meredien Hotel and building concierge services! The condo features include central air conditioning and heat, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, dishwasher, washer and dryer, hardwood floors and HDTVs.
Luxury building which includes concierge, room service until 10pm from the adjoining hotel, hotel room discounts for guests, fitness center, lounge, and a large shared roof deck with expansive views of DC and the river plus grills and patio seating. Conveniently located directly across the bridge from Georgetown and across the street from the Rosslyn metro (Orange, Blue and Silver line metros). Garage parking for two cars are available for an additional fee.

Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
Fully furnished Rosslyn 1 bedroom condo, on the 8th floor, in River Place East. Located just opposite the National Mall along the Potomac River, Rosslyn offers convenient access to the nation’s capital, Arlington's most famous landmarks and the National Airport. It has many restaurants, grocery stores and shops. The condo has amazing views of the Potomac, Monuments and DC from both the living room and bedroom windows. The kitchen is stocked with all the tools needed for cooking. A queen bed is in the bedroom. The property has central air conditioning. The building features a front desk, swimming pool, fitness facility and a coin operated laundry room. The Rosslyn Metro Station (Orange and Blue Line) is just 4 blocks. Walk score: 82 (Very Walkable), transportation score: 71, and bike score: 81.

Description:
Available Dec 25, 2017.
-
Fully furnished, renovated studio condo in Rosslyn. Located just opposite the National Mall along the Potomac River, Rosslyn offers convenient access to the nation’s capital, Arlington's most famous landmarks and the National Airport. It has many restaurants and shops plus is an easy walk to Georgetown. The condo features a renovated kitchen equipped with a gas stove, granite counter tops and all the tools needed for cooking. The living area has a full size murphy bed, a dining area and a sitting area. This property includes wall unit air conditioning. 
The building features a front desk concierge that takes care of packages and other resident services, a fitness center and swimming pool. Renovated 7,000 square-foot fitness center that offers steam room, sauna, weights, state-of-the-art exercise equipment, pool tables and ping pong. The swimming pool is a large resort-style pool with lap lanes and a burbling, hot whirlpool in a Japanese-style rock garden setting. There is also an early-opening late-closing grocery store, coin operated laundry room, salon and professional dry cleaners on the premises. It is 1.5 blocks from the Rosslyn Metro Station (Orange/Blue Line - direct to the Pentagon, Reagan National Airport, Foggy Bottom, downtown DC, Federal Triangle and Capitol). Parking is available. Walk Score: 69 (Somewhat Walkable), Transportation Score: 67, Bike Score: 81.
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description: Bartton Place is a charming location just one block from Columbia Pike, a buzzing main road in Arlington. This garden style community features your choice of 1, 2 or 3 bedrooms with easy access to the Pentagon and Pentagon City metro stations via metro bus. Bailey's Crossroads is right up the street, which includes many grocery stores, restaurants and shopping outlets. Come find out why Bartton Place is a community of convenience, Because Where You Live Matters.

Description:
(703) 241-0700 - 1 BR Apartment in Westover Area - Call the office at 703-241-0700
Shinny wood floor, efficient use of space in floor plan, Large bedroom, ceiling fan,New Galley Kitchen, full size fridge and gas stove.Apartment located on Bus line between Ballston metro and East Falls Church metro stations along the #2 bus routes. 15 minutes to Ballston metro via the Custis Trail. Also convenient to Rt. 66 to points east (Washington DC ) and west ( Tysons Corner & Reston )
Near Baseball and Soccer fields at end of the block at the Westover Park. Also convenient to the W &OD TRAIL for all park bike trail activities
(RLNE2360350)

Description:
(703) 241-0700 - Lovely One bed room Apartment - 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT FOR RENT call 703-241-0700
Shiny hardwood floors, efficient use of space in floor plan, Large bedroom, ceiling fan,Galley Kitchen, full size fridge and gas stove. a/c window unit included, coin operated Laundry, Building Rent includes free: heat, water, hot water and trash removal. Tenant pays electric and cooking gas, Metro bus right in front of the building. along all the #2 bus routes-, Marymount University Ballston Campus, 66E into D.C as well as 66W to Tysons, Reston and 495 N & S-What is 2 blocks away?-W &OD TRAIL --westover park park, playground, Baseball and Soccer field -Lost Dog Caf--Stray Cat--Westover Market and Beer Garden The Beer Haus--Post Office--Wells Fargo Bank--Rite Aid Pharmacy--Italian Store -Ayers Hardware--Convenient to both Ballston and East Falls Church metro stations -1.5 miles to ball to Ballston or east Falls church metro (get there by bike path even closer). 
Home is professionally managed. You have the ability to:View and pay your bills anytime (24/7)
View and pay your bills from anywhere (any computer with an internet connection) have the option to Set up an automatic payments ,Sign up for automatic reminder emails, Review your payment history
Submit and track your Maintenance Requests ,
. 
There is an online application go toPMEproperties.com. Scroll down the home page until you see the apartment that you are applying for. There is an apply here" button. It will require a credit card pament of $55. We check credit, income and rental history. Lease info:12 month lease-- NO more than two people per bedroom ,no dogs, NO smokers or NO birds.
(RLNE2001926)

Description: Your new home awaits you at The Taylor. These cozy garden-style one, two and three bedroom apartment homes enjoy convenient access to Washington, D.C. These attractively-priced homes are perfect for those looking for a suburban atmosphere, yet close enough to city vibrancy. Located in Rosslyn, Virginia, The Taylor sits on a tree lined street near scenic bike and jogging trails. Spacious open floor plans feature new kitchen and bathroom amenities, wood parquet floors, washer and dryer, and fantastic closets. On-site parking is available. Living at The Taylor apartments is not only convenient but allows for an easy walk to Rosslyns city center and Georgetown.

Description: Penrose Square was designed to be a lively, pedestrian-friendly development. It is perfectly situated in a culturally rich and unique community brimming with a wide range of tastes and lifestyles. At Penrose, everything you need is right where you need it-- at your doorstep. A variety of retail and restaurants abound on the first floor inviting you to indulge in food, shopping and entertainment. The community offers a full-service business center with high-speed internet, copier and fax. In your downtime head to the state-of-the-art fitness center or host a private party in the 4,000 square foot clubhouse. Unwind by lounging by our resort-style pool. Enjoy the outdoors with a picnic in our grilling courtyard. Put your skills to the test on our private putting green. All enjoyment is nestled in the lush beauty of landscaped grounds that are reminiscent of an oasis. Penrose supports going green initiatives and is pleased to offer a non-smoking environment throughout the property.

Description: Welcome to The Macedonia Apartments. Our community is is nestled in a vibrant neighborhood surrounded by shopping, dining, sprawling parks, bike trails, and plenty of entertainment. We have an ideal location for the lifestyle you want.Our apartment homes provide options to meet the needs of almost anyone looking for a new home. To make life easier, our homes are complete with sleek designs and spacious floorplans. We also offer lavish master bedrooms, spacious walk-in closets, large living rooms and gourmet kitchens with upgraded appliances. So you always feel like coming home is a joy, this meticulously landscaped community offers a rooftop patio lounge, garage parking, professional onsite staff and 24 hour emergency maintenance. Located in prestigious Arlington Virginia The Macedonia is only minutes from fine restaurants, offices, shops and entertainment. This community also has access to Washington DC's main arteries of I-395 and Hwy 50. Come home to quality and affordable Arlingto

Description: Cherry Hill is a quiet, garden style community offering convenience to Washington DC. Each unit offers a full size washer/dryer, wall-to-wall carpeting and frost-free refrigerators. Its location right on the metro bus line gives you direct service to the Rosslyn metro station. Get your workout in at our state of the art fitness center and go just next door to Safeway and Lyon Village, which includes restaurants, shopping as well as biking and hiking trails. Come experience the convenience of these lovely Arlington apartments, Because Where You Live Matters.

Description: Fort Henry Gardens provides 82 affordable townhome style apartments set along Arlington, Virginia's quiet tree-lined streets minutes from the bustling Shirlington neighborhood. With easy access to I-395, Pentagon City, Crystal City, and Shirlington Village, Fort Henry Gardens has a uniquely convenient location with neighborhood parks, shopping, and restaurants just minutes away. The two- and three-bedroom all-brick apartment town homes include full-featured kitchens and year-round climate control. The complex features AHCs award-winning Resident Services program, which provides educational opportunities for children, teens and adults.

Description: The goal isnt to live like everyone else, it's to live better  right here at vPoint Apartments in Clarendon. Begin with the perfect location at the Clarendon Metro, with stores, restaurants and nightlife. Add fabulous new eco-friendly apartment residences, high-style features, stunning views of DC, the National Cathedral and Northern Virginia. Its an opportunity to live in a way thats exceptional and utterly you. Visit and discover how vPoint makes life vibrant.

Description:
Great 2 Bedroom, 3 Full Bath unit available November 1st, 2015. Stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, in-unit washer dryer. Split-level with living area downstairs and two bedrooms (both with in-suite full baths) upstairs.
Near all the great restaurants and amenities of the redeveloped Ballston area. Walking distance from Marymount and George Mason Law. Commuter's dream: .2 miles from Ballston Metro Station on the Orange line (Virginia Square, Clarendon, Courthouse, Rosslyn, Foggy Bottom) and Silver line (to Tysons). Includes one parking space. Sorry, no pets.

Images: ![Primary Photo - Westover Village 2 Bed, 1 Bath](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/ZyKI9vtLKSWEEN0c-dUkm6ZTamtsy818Z_-OLMeS598/117/westover-village-2-bed-1-bath-arlington-va-primary-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - Westover Village 2 Bed, 1 Bath](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/lwhlfRslHfp9WE7faPMLF9nV0MIX3s_a2RUDv4PDUWc/117/westover-village-2-bed-1-bath-arlington-va-building-photo.jpg)
Description: 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment available for rent as of September 8th. A one month rent deposit of $1695 is required. No move in fee. The rent includes water and trash but not gas and electric, utilities are usually $40-$70 a month total. Pets are ok. -2 bedrooms -1 full bath -Updated Kitchen with Gas Range -Central Air -Wall to wall carpet -Good closet space -Laundry in basement -Great Location! Located off of Washington Blvd between East Falls and Ballston station on the Orange Line, easily accessible by the 2A bus (5 minute ride) or a 20 minute walk. Also conveniently located near I-66, 1-495, the Italian Store, Westover Beer Garden, Lost Dog & Stray Cat Caf, Lebanese Taverna, Rite Aid, Westover Library, the W&OD/Four Mile/Custis trails, Westover Park, and more.

Description:
CLARENDON (North Arlington): Large one bedroom, one bath apartment with adorable screened porch, available in quiet, garden-style building, the Irving. In beautiful Lyon Park neighborhood, walk to the Clarendon metro, Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, bars & restaurants. Unzoned parking on the street for your cars and guests. Relaxing screened porch
Newly remodeled eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, modern stainless steel appliances, new cabinets Oak floors refinished throughout
Freshly painted Sunny bedroom with room for a king/queen size bed, desk and dresser
Large living room space
Walk-in closet with plenty of storage space
Brand new full size washer and dryer in apartment
Heating and water included in monthly rent No pets
Smoke-free building Rent is $1900 a month, includes water and heat. Available June 1.

Features:
* High Speed Internet Access
* Air Conditioning
* Smoke Free
